channel.title: I don't get the error
channel.description:
[code]server.java:90: cannot find symbol symbol : method add(java.lang.String) location: class java.util.ArrayList Connections.add(connectingHost); ^[/code] In my Server.java :
import java.util.ArrayList;
ArrayList Connections = new ArrayList(); Connections.add(connectingHost);

item.title: I don't get the error
item.dc:creator: @_Java_Maybe • Java Maybe •
item.description:
@_Java_Maybe wrote:

server.java:90: cannot find symbol symbol : method add(java.lang.String) location: class java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> Connections.add(connectingHost); ^

In my Server.java :

import java.util.ArrayList;
ArrayList Connections = new ArrayList(); Connections.add(connectingHost);
